definition: to make sheep eyes at/to cast amorous glances at
eyebrow/upper margin
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
biography/historical narrative/commentaries/relay station
feeling/emotion/passion/situation

sentences.english: Her eyes spoke to him at the party.
sentences.chinese: 在宴会上她对他眉目传情。

sentences.english: He tried in a hundred ways to convey his own feelings, casting arch glances at them.
sentences.chinese: 他乘机百般撩拨，眉目传情。

sentences.english: Ogle with little horse in Seven Star Park.
sentences.chinese: 与七星公园的马儿“眉目传情”。

sentences.english: Have eye contact with others but make sure you do not stare or ogle.
sentences.chinese: 有目光接触其他人，但确保你不要盯或眉目传情。
